content.name: ProjectX4
content.description: Adds a full lineup of new Ship Parts. Also adds SETA Parts, Mod Parts, and Paint Jobs to Station Traders. Legalizes some common Xenon, and free mined wares. Unlocks Scaleplate Pact Relations.
content.author: ManDaxi
